name: Towaga: Among Shadows Demo
description:
Hey there, we're happy to present you a demo of our upcoming game Towaga: Among Shadows.

Towaga is a 2D single-player action-packed game which will embark you on a journey through more than 70 levels in lush jungles, ancient temples and starlight skies.

Feel free to give us your feedback about this demo!
Coming soon on Nintendo Switch & Steam.
Check out the Steam page!

If you want to see a bit more about the process behind the game, we are making some Unity & Photoshop tutorials on our Youtube channel.
Check out the Youtube Channel!

(Note, demo in 13 languages)
